message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CR, cs.SY

This paper proposes a training strategy for difficult learning tasks that involves combining solutions to easier subproblems. This approach is closely related to reinforcement learning and artificial intelligence, which are both covered by the cs.LG and cs.AI sub-categories. The paper also presents results in algorithmic environments, which suggests a focus on robotics and control (cs.RO) as well as computer security (cs.CR). Finally, the use of human demonstrations and judgments implies a connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
